response: I smell fresh meat. You can't hide from me, little morsel.
That scent...my next meal draws near. I will feast on your bones!
Your fear permeates these halls. I track your sweat and breath. Nowhere to run!
The game is over. I've caught your scent, and your doom is at hand!
You reek of mortal terror. Don't worry, your death will come swiftly.
I hear your footsteps, I feel your heartbeat. You cannot flee your destiny!
Run. The chase excites me. But you only prolong the inevitable.
Fresh blood pumps through your veins. I will drink my fill!
Closer...closer...I smell your life essence. You will sate my hunger!
Come into my embrace! Struggling only spices the meat.
I've dined on countless souls, but yours shall be a special treat.
You cannot outwit me. I know every twist and turn. You're already mine.
Your life ends here, morsel. I shall slice you open and feast!
Your fear is intoxicating. I will relish eating you slowly.
You're near now. I feel your body heat. Succumb to your destiny!
Closer...closer...your tender flesh awaits my teeth!
I've never lost prey in this maze. You cannot stop the inevitable.
Come, meet your fate! My stomach rumbles for your flesh.
I smell your sweat, I hear your heart. You've nowhere left to crawl!
You're mine now. Your bones will pave my labyrinth!
